name: adrenaline-orb
effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies. Held: increases the holder’s Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.
short_effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies. Held: increases the holder’s Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

flavor_text.sword_shield: If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated.
